## About Me

Hello! My name is Ryann, and I am currently a sophomore at the University of Texas at Austin. I am studying Statistics and Data Science and minoring in Art History. My favorite thing about UT so far would probably be the beautiful campus and its architecture. I hope to continue to meet new people, and also learn many new things!
